page.title: 06Tourism in Lorton
page.content: Tourism is the second industry in this area, after farming, the main attraction for tourists is the spectacular scenery. To cater for tourists there is one hotel, five houses and seven farms providing Bed and Breakfast. One Inn which offers accommodation, and seven cottages and flats let to holiday makers for self catering, plus two caravan sites. A few farmers provide camping areas for Scouts, Guides or Tourists. For recreation, the village has a flourishing Tennis Club. There is fishing in the river, for which a permit may be obtained, or walking and climbing the fells, painting or photographing the beautiful scenery. Entertainment in the form of Darts and Dominoes can be enjoyed at the Inn but most visitors come for the peace and quiet of the village.
